Callback7Header: Bring the Bag of Foodstuffs to Tadhg
Name: The Starving Strand
Phase0Description: An old man named Baltair in Braestaig has asked me to bring some food to his starving family in Corbach.
Phase32Description: An old man named Baltair in Braestaig has asked me to bring some food to his starving family in Corbach. I still need to get the food from him.
Phase8Description:
An old man named Baltair in Braestaig has asked me to bring some food to his starving family in Corbach.

I just need to make room in my pack...
Toast: Help a man get food back to his hungry family.
